group_descriptions: Time series with distinct, smooth, large-amplitude seasonal oscillations (waves) superimposed on the trend (e.g., [1,1], [1,2], [2,2], [3,3]).
Time series with a 'jagged' or noisy texture where seasonal patterns are obscured or absent, showing a rougher linear descent (e.g., [1,4], [2,1], [4,1]).
gemini_response.observation: The cluster is heterogeneous. While all plots show a downward trend (subsidence), they split clearly into two morphological types: those with very smooth, prominent seasonal waves (oscillatory) and those with a rough, jagged, noisy trajectory. This suggests two different physical behaviors or signal qualities within the same cluster.
